cerebralix tincture
 
cerebralix tincture was developed according to many years of experience an...
            
          
          
         
          
          
          
          
            
              
cerebralix tincture
 
cerebralix tincture was developed according to many years of experience and the latest research to support brain health and promote memory. designed by professional herbalists, this formula is singularly targeted to achieve the desired goal, as the herbs in its composition perfectly combine to reinforce each other.

how does it work?

supports the nervous system
boosts memory 
enhances focus and concentration
protects brain cells from free radical damage
improves mood


the formula’s composition:


gotu kola prefers wet tropical areas, has circular green leaves and possesses a number of incredible health benefits. in addition to its strong regenerative properties, gotu kola is valued for its beneficial effects on mental health, supporting the nervous system, increasing cognition, and boosting memory.  


ginkgo biloba is a tree native to china. it is the last living representative of the order ginkgoales, which grew on the earth over 290 million years ago. ginkgo biloba is a source of phenolic compounds, flavonoids, terpenoids, and other organic chemicals that beneficially affect the body. it stimulates neural activity, memory, focus, and creative thinking, and improves mood.


rosemary is a fragrant herb natively growing in the mediterranean. it is loved by many for its earthy aroma and taste. it also has many health benefits as a source of vitamin a, vitamin b6, thiamin, vitamin c, folate, magnesium, iron and calcium. rosemary is appreciated as a cognitive stimulant, as it enhances memory and focus.


sage, botanically known as salvia officinalis, is a perennial woody herb native to the mediterranean region. being closely related to rosemary, sage is also known as a cognition booster. sage helps to preserve and improve memory, increase concentration and enhance focus.


brahmi, also called herb of grace and water hyssop, is a creeping perennial herb that has been traditionally used in ayurvedic medicine for centuries. it is useful for stimulating cognitive skills, such as memory, focus and concentration. brahmi also promotes relaxation, easing stress and anxiety, and helps protect brain health into old age.


ashwagandha, also known as indian ginseng or winter cherry, is an herb that has been valued in ayurvedic medicine for centuries. ashwagandha is believed to lower cortisol levels, thus facilitating tranquility and providing anti-stress and anti-anxiety properties. due to its rich antioxidant content, ashwagandha is useful for protecting brain cells from free radical damage, thereby supporting memory and other cognitive skills. 


lemon balm is native to southern parts of europe, where it was traditionally used to support health. lemon balm possesses calming properties, enhances mood, balances hormone levels, and boosts cognitive skills.


made from the premium quality raw material for the highest results.we only select premium grade herb suppliers, prioritize organic facilities and quality from clean areas around the globeto produce this potent extract, using patented hyper raw-extraction and cold-processing technology.
suggested use:
adults take 30-50 drops of extract in a small amount of water or favorite juice 2-4 times daily between meals.
warnings:
shake well before using.not to be used during pregnancy or lactation.if you have a medical condition or take medications, please consult with your doctor before use.keep away from children. use only as directed on label.
safety sealed for your protection.ask for replacement if safety seal is broken.
